Congratulations to prime minister of Lithuania
articles.content:
Congratulations to prime minister of Lithuania 
    Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- Hong Song Nam, premier of the DPRK cabinet, sent a congratulatory message to Algirdas Brazauskas on the latter's appointment as prime minister of Lithuania.
 The message expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on good terms in the interests of the two peoples and sincerely wished him great success in his responsible work.

Greetings to FM of Philippines
articles.content:
Greetings to FM of Philippines 
    Pyongyang, July 11 (KCNA) -- DPRK foreign minister Paek Nam Sun sent a message of greetings to Teofisto T. Guingona, vice-president and foreign minister of the Republic of the Philippines, on the first anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and the Philippines.
 The message noted that the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries on July 12 last year marked a significant event which helped deepen the understanding and trust between the two peoples and further develop the bilateral cooperation in political, economic, cultural and other fields.    
 Expressing the belief that the friendly relations between the two countries, which have favourably developed since the opening of diplomatic ties,  would continue to grow stronger, it wished Teofisto T. Guingona success in his work.
